channel.title: Comments on: Back to Basics
channel.description: Scattered pages from an apocryphal diary

item.title: By: Drey
item.dc:creator: Drey
item.description: I'm nearing the end of Valkyria Chronicles, which is a great sort of tactical RPG.
item.content:encoded: I’m nearing the end of Valkyria Chronicles, which is a great sort of tactical RPG.

item.title: By: Jeff
item.dc:creator: Jeff
item.description:
I look forward to the unveiling of the new project.
Any memorable video games in your media consumption?
item.content:encoded:
I look forward to the unveiling of the new project.

Any memorable video games in your media consumption?

item.title: By: Drey
item.dc:creator: Drey
item.description: I'm just waiting for Guild of Blades to get around to looking at my file.
item.content:encoded: I’m just waiting for Guild of Blades to get around to looking at my file.

item.title: By: Marc
item.dc:creator: Marc
item.description: I like the Project. It looks great, and I think it succeeds where other similar attempts are lacking. Very much looking forward to seeing it emerge from its egg.
item.content:encoded: I like the Project. It looks great, and I think it succeeds where other similar attempts are lacking. Very much looking forward to seeing it emerge from its egg.
